Seal characters (1)

礐字的基本解释

礐
què
疾风激水击石成声。
山多大石。
坚硬；坚定：“坚礐其志谊。”

礐
hú
玉石。

礐字的汉语字典释义

[①]［què］
［《廣韻》苦角切，入覺，溪。］
［《廣韻》胡谷切，入屋，匣。］
［《廣韻》力摘切，入麥，來。］
(1)多大石的山。
(2)大石。
(3)水击石声。亦指水击石。
(4)见“礐硞”。
(5)比喻坚正；坚定。
[②]［hú］
［《廣韻》胡沃切，入沃，匣。］
见“礐2石”。

礐字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【石字部】　礐； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页837第32
【廣韻】苦角切【集韻】【韻會】克角切，?音確。【爾雅·釋山】山多大石也。【說文】礐，石聲。　又【廣韻】胡覺切，音學。【正字通】礐與嶨通。有卻學二音，兼山多石，石聲二義。字雖有从石从山之別，然山石一類，說文嶨訓山多大石，礐訓石聲，誤分爲二。集韻合之，是也。　又【廣韻】胡沃切，音鵠。又胡谷切，音斛。義?同。　又力摘切，音?。礐硞，水石聲。【郭璞·江賦】幽?積岨，礐硞䃕礭。【註】皆水激石，嶮峻不平貌。　又【集韻】離宅切，音力。義同。

礐字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
礐字的起名意思

本义指疾风激水击石成声，也有玉石，坚定，坚硬，山多大石之义。

què
The gust of wind shook the rocks with water.
The mountain is so big and rocky.
Hard; firm: "Strengthen its will."

hú
jade.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［què］
["Guangyun" bitter angle cut, enter into sleep, stream. ]
["Guangyun" Hu Guqie, enter the house, box. ]
["Guangyun" picks and cuts, enters the wheat, come. ]
(1) How big a rocky mountain is.
(2) Dashi.
(3) The sound of water hitting rocks. Also refers to water hammer.
(4) See "礐硞".
(5) The analogy is firm; firm.
[②]［hú］
["Guangyun" Hu Woqie, enter Wo, box. ]
See "Two Stones".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Collection] [Stone Character Department] 　礐; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 837 32
[Guang Yun] bitter corner cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme] Ke corner cut, the sound is correct. [Erya Shishan] There are many mountains and rocks. [Speaking text] Deng, stone sound.　[Guangyun] Hu Jueqie, phonology. 【Zhengzitong】Tong and Changtong are connected. Some learn two sounds, but they are both mountains and rocks. Although the characters are different from the stone from the mountain, but the mountain is a kind of stone, saying that Wen Xun Xun has many big rocks in the mountain, and the sound of the Xun Xun stone is mistakenly divided into two. The collection of rhyme is also true.　[Guangyun] Hu Woqie, Yinhu. Hu Guqie again, Yinhu. Righteous? Same.　I tried to pick and cut again, the sound?.礐硞, the sound of water and rocks. [Guo Pu·Jiang Fu] Quiet? [Note] They are all water rock stones, and their appearance is steep and uneven.　 [Ji Yun] Leaving the house, sound power. The same meaning.

Jade
Name meaning
The original meaning refers to the sound of strong wind and water hitting rocks, and there is also jade, firm, hard, and the meaning of mountains and rocks.
què, lè
I què прил.
1) * каменистый, скалистый (о горах)
2) твёрдый, непоколебимый
II què, lè
звукоподр. звук ударяющихся друг о друга камней (особенно в потоке); цокать; грохотать
